statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover_policy WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover_policy WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_turnover_policy WHERE turnover_rate < 5.5 ORDER BY turnover_rate ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover_policy WHERE quantity = 75;
SELECT AVG(turnover_rate) AS average_turnover_rate FROM inventory_turnover_policy;
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover_policy WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(turnover_rate) as avg_rate FROM inventory_turnover_policy GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_rate > 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory_turnover_policy WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY turnover_rate ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM inventory_turnover_policy GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(quantity) as avg_quantity, AVG(turnover_rate) as avg_rate FROM inventory_turnover_policy GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_quantity > 50 AND avg_rate < 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE product_name = 'Apple'
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM Inventory JOIN Orders ON Inventory.product_id = Orders.product_id
SELECT order_id, order_quantity FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_quantity FROM Orders JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, order_date FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Orders ON Inventory.product_id = Orders.product_id WHERE Orders.order_quantity > 20;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM Inventory WHERE quantity = (SELECT MAX(quantity) FROM Inventory);
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, turnover_rate FROM inventory WHERE turnover_rate > 0.5;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM turnover_policies ORDER BY policy_name;
SELECT * FROM inventory_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE turnover_rate >= 0.5;
SELECT product_id, quantity, turnover_rate FROM inventory WHERE quantity * turnover_rate <= 500 ORDER BY turnover_rate ASC, product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC;

SELECT inventory.product_id, inventory.quantity, turnover_policies.policy_name FROM inventory JOIN turnover_policies ON inventory.quantity <= turnover_policies.max_quantity AND inventory.turnover_rate <= turnover_policies.max_turnover_rate ORDER BY inventory.product_id, turnover_policies.policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity_ordered FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.order_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity_ordered FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY customer_name, product_name;
SELECT * FROM Inventory_Items;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Inventory_Items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, turnover_ratio FROM Inventory_Items WHERE turnover_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT item_name, quantity * unit_price AS total_value FROM Inventory_Items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, turnover_ratio FROM Inventory_Items WHERE unit_price < 50.00 ORDER BY turnover_ratio DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory_Items ORDER BY item_id DESC, item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory_Items WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT i.item_name, p.purchase_date, s.supplier_name FROM Inventory_Items i JOIN Purchases p ON i.item_id = p.item_id JOIN Suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id ORDER BY p.purchase_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales, AVG(selling_price) AS avg_price FROM Sales
SELECT il.log_date, il.log_description, i.item_name FROM Inventory_Log il LEFT JOIN Inventory_Items i ON il.item_id = i.item_id WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date ASC
